subject.normal: [Webkit-unassigned] [Bug 30520] Enable creation of custom SidebarTreeElements for different ProfileTypes

body.para: This sounds much more complex than "profile.type.viewForProfile(profile)". Should we make profile have this property in order to get rid of key parsing?
